p: In addition, ribavirin is contraindicated during pregnancy, due to its potential teratogenicity demonstrated in many animal models studied [ 120]. Controversially, several evidences demonstrate that the teratogenicity effect of ribavirin associated with humans is not significant, as observed when the Ribavirin Pregnancy Registry was established in 2003 [ 121]. However, more information on possible placental interference caused by ribavirin is needed to ensure its use.
